cleaned_text: Bath & Body Works Balance Aromatherapy Bath & Body Fragrances by Bath & Body Works Balance Aromatherapy by [Bath & Body Works](../) - A new relaxing aromatic fragrance collection is added to the Aromatherapy line of products. Natural essential oils of juniper and coriander blend together to help you "regulate emotions" and "stimulate positivity." Launched in October 2019 this new scented body collection is available in moisturizing Body Cream, enriched with shea butter and vitamin E, and Foaming Body Wash, with bamboo extract and soothing aloe, online and at your local Bath & Body Works stores.
